articles.author: Elliot Smith
articles.title: European shares subdued ahead of Fed summit - CNBC
articles.description: European markets were muted on Wednesday, tracking global sentiment as investors await a key meeting of central bankers.
articles.content:
LONDON European markets were muted on Wednesday, tracking global sentiment as investors await a key meeting of central bankers.

articles.title: Rugby: Captain Sam Whitelock, Aaron Smith 'unlikely' to join All Blacks for Rugby Championship - Newshub
articles.description: The All Blacks will leave for Australia and Europe on Thursday, without two of their key players.
articles.content:
The All Blacks will likely depart for their bumper road trip to Australia and Europe without two of their key players - including their captain.
